setup

public void setup()
Sets the default icon, and tooltip (if they are not already set) based on the value of command. Also calls setup(this). Note: does not set default Text.

See Also:
setup(boolean,boolean,boolean,boolean)

setup

public void setup(boolean bSetup,
                  boolean bIcon,
                  boolean bText,
                  boolean bToolTip)
Sets the default icon, text, and tooltip based on the value of command.

Parameters:
bSetup - if true, calls setup(this) to set border, mouseover.
bIcon - if true, calls getIcon(command) to set icon
bText - if true, set to command name

setupButton

public static void setupButton(javax.swing.AbstractButton cmd)
Called automatically for all new OAButtons if AutoSetup is true (default).
Does the following:
  • setFocusPainted(false)
  • setBorderPainted(false)
  • setMargin(new Insets(1,1,1,1))
  • public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent e) { setBorderPainted(true) }
  • public void mouseExited(MouseEvent e) { setBorderPainted(false) }

See Also:
#setAutoSetup, JComponent.setRequestFocusEnabled(boolean)

setManual

public void setManual(boolean b)
If true, then command is not executed when button is clicked, else default command action is executed.

public boolean getManual()
If true, then command is not executed when button is clicked, else default command action is executed.

onActionPerformed

public void onActionPerformed()
This is a callback method that can be overwritten to replace the default action when button is clicked. By default, this will call teh button controller, which will also call performAction().

See Also:
to create a custom action.

Called to perform custom action event.
